LanguageData.MMTank_NOBASU.label: Wild bus
LanguageData.MMTank_NOBASU.description:
A proud field van that went wild after the legendary destruction.
People called hunters repeatedly try to make their own cars, but they have failed except a few.
It's not have any weapons, but no human can withstand the accel turn of Van's big body.
It is equipped with a very cold metal detector, which in its spare time picks up iron scraps and components.
LanguageData.MMTank_NOBASU.tools.0.label: Accel turn
